text: The FIS Alpine World Ski Championships 2003 were held in St. Moritz, Switzerland, at Piz Nair from February 2-16, 2003.:de:Alpine Skiweltmeisterschaft 2003 St. Moritz previously hosted the world championships in 1974, as well as the 1948 Winter Olympics and the 1928 Winter Olympics (no alpine skiing). ==Men's events== ===Men's downhill=== Date: February 8 {| style="border-style:solid;border-width:1px;border-color:#808080;background- color:#EFEFEF" cellspacing="2" cellpadding="2" width="380px" |- bgcolor="#EFEFEF" !
